description: This file defines the NotesService class in an Angular application, managing CRUD operations and in-memory storage for notes, including persistence to localStorage.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: Service class managing notes, including creation, update, deletion, and retrieval, with in-memory signals and persistence.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the service, loading notes from localStorage or creating a default welcome note.

methods.name: persist
methods.description: Saves the current notes to localStorage.

methods.name: uuid
methods.description: Generates a UUID for new notes, using crypto if available or a fallback.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided data, assigns IDs and timestamps, updates in-memory store, and persists.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note by ID with provided changes, updates timestamp, and persists.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and persists the change.

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by ID.
